sentences.en: Ade and Brooks exchanged blows yesterday and they were severely punished today.
sentences.cn: 艾德和布鲁克斯昨天打起来了,今天他们受到严厉的惩罚.

sentences.en: An aircraft overshot the runway and was severely damaged.
sentences.cn: 一架飞机冲出了跑道，严重受损。

sentences.en: He was diagnosed as severely dyslexic but extraordinarily bright.
sentences.cn: 他被诊断患有严重的阅读困难症，但是却绝顶聪明。

sentences.en: He was wounded in both legs and severely peppered with shrapnel.
sentences.cn: 他两条腿都挂彩了，人也被如雨的弹片炸成重伤。

sentences.en: His blood pressure had dropped severely.
sentences.cn: 他的血压下降得很严重。

sentences.en: His powers will be severely curtailed.
sentences.cn: 他的权力将受到极大的限制。

sentences.en: I escaped with severely bruised legs.
sentences.cn: 我拖着有严重淤伤的腿逃走了。

sentences.en: Nearly a third of the children were severely underweight.
sentences.cn: 近1/3的孩子体重严重偏轻。

sentences.en: Nerves became severely frayed when air traffic problems delayed the flight.
sentences.cn: 当航班由于空中交通问题而延误时，人们变得异常烦躁起来。

sentences.en: The drought has severely disrupted agricultural production.
sentences.cn: 旱灾已严重影响了农业生产。

sentences.en: The film was severely cut up by many reviewers.
sentences.cn: 这部电影受到许多评论者的严厉批评.

sentences.en: The officers were severely reprimanded for their unprofessional behaviour.
sentences.cn: 军官们因违反职业规则而受到了严厉的斥责。

sentences.en: The town was severely damaged in the war.
sentences.cn: 这座城镇在战争中遭到了严重破坏。

sentences.en: Their plane had been severely buffeted by storms.
sentences.cn: 他们的飞机遭受到风暴的重创。

sentences.en: Those responsible for this crime will be severely punished.
sentences.cn: 犯下这宗罪行的人将受到严厉惩罚。
